channel.title: What can i do?
channel.description:
hi everyone, i hope i state this as clearly as i can. [u][b]problem:[/b][/u] I can only log in with ip 0.0.0.0 and port 5555 my ip is supposed to be pkaz.no-ip.biz and port 43594 but if i have 5555 that is ok to. [u][b]what ive done so far:[/b][/u] ok so this will be the first server i have made so correct me if i actually did something wrong, i have gotten jdk updates, gotten a source (ultimate pk source), im using silabsoft client(download one), and i have tried many compilers i have been able to get in with 0.0.0.0 but i cannot get in with my regular ip that i want to use. O yea i also have done no-ip and i checked the name i wanted to be in use or whatever. Basicly if i didnt say that very well is that i checkmarked the one i wanted to use (pkaz.no-ip.biz) and it turned into that smiley without the glasses and said that no dns update is needed or whatever. also if u need to know this when i run the server it says: starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:5555
also if you need any pictures just ask and ill gladly post them :), thanks 451465

umm not sure how to upload i have a gmail and i could send you the files if gmail is a uploader. sorry about this im just not a “computer tech person” so im not sure really how to do most of this stuff

451465

item.title: What can i do?
item.description:
@451465 wrote:

ok i kind of dont understand your question but ill do what i can.
Client:
i have tryed the moparscape, and silab client (the downloadable ones)
ok here is the picture

umm there it is i hope you can read it. if you can it says starting pimpscape server 0.0.0.0:5555 but for some reason when that happens i can only log in with 0.0.0.0 and not the ip i want to use (pkaz.no-ip.biz)

i hope this helps,
451465

thanks,
451465

item.title: What can i do?
item.description:
@451465 wrote:

hi everyone,
i hope i state this as clearly as i can.
problem:
I can only log in with ip 0.0.0.0 and port 5555
my ip is supposed to be pkaz.no-ip.biz and port 43594 but if i have 5555 that is ok to.
what ive done so far:
ok so this will be the first server i have made so correct me if i actually did something wrong,
i have gotten jdk updates, gotten a source (ultimate pk source), im using silabsoft client(download one), and i have tried many compilers i have been able to get in with 0.0.0.0 but i cannot get in with my regular ip that i want to use. O yea i also have done no-ip and i checked the name i wanted to be in use or whatever. Basicly if i didnt say that very well is that i checkmarked the one i wanted to use (pkaz.no-ip.biz) and it turned into that smiley without the glasses and said that no dns update is needed or whatever. also if u need to know this when i run the server it says:
starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:5555

also if you need any pictures just ask and ill gladly post them :),
thanks 451465

Read full topic
